trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [black cards total v] to [0] set [row number v] to [1] ask [How many rows would you like to enter?] and wait set [number of rows v] to (answer) repeat (number of rows) set [index v] to [1] ask (join (join (join [Please enter ] (number of rows)) [ cards for row ]) (row number)) and wait set [row v] to (answer) repeat (length of (row)) if <(letter (index) of (row)) = [B]> then change [black cards total v] by (1) end change [index v] by (1) end if <((black cards total) mod (2)) = [0]> then say (join (join [Row ] (row number)) [ is OK!]) for (2) secs else say (join [There is a parity error is row ] (row number)) for (2) secs end change [row number v] by (1) set [black cards total v] to [0] end
